message.content:
Neural Networks, Rule Learning. 

Neural Networks: The paper describes the Extentron algorithm which grows multi-layer networks using the simple perceptron rule for linear threshold units. The algorithm is compared to other neural network paradigms.

Rule Learning: The paper discusses the perceptron learning algorithm and its convergence properties. The Extentron algorithm is described as using the simple perceptron rule for linear threshold units. The algorithm can be completely specified using only two parameters. The paper also compares the Extentron to symbolic learning systems.
